items.name: Shengolya
items.description: Dish from Maharashtra, where dough rings made with wholewheat flour mixed with spices are simmered in a broth made with onion, ginger, garlic and other spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Chicken Kharda
items.description: A spicy and flavorful Indian dish that combines tender pieces of chicken with "thecha" which is a fiery green chili and garlic chutney. The thecha adds intense heat and flavor to the chicken, creating a spicy and aromatic dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Methi Muthiya
items.description: A popular Indian snack or side dish made from fenugreek leaves and gram flour (besan). It involves mixing chopped fenugreek leaves, gram flour, and various spices to form a dough, which is then shaped into small cylindrical or oval dumplings and deep-fried until they are cooked and have a golden brown crust. (6 pieces)

items.name: Tamarind Rice
items.description: Rice mixed with tamarind juice, peanut and spices, topped with curry leaves. Served with papad.

items.name: Kachkolar Dalna
items.description: A Bengali dish made from plantains mashed with spices and besan (gram flour), shaped into small dumplings, and deep-fried until golden brown. These koftas are then simmered in a rich and flavorful curry made from a tomato-onion base, creating a delightful vegetarian dish with a perfect blend of textures and tastes.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Kosha Mangso
items.description: A classic Bengali dish from India. It is a slow-cooked lamb curry known for its rich, dark, and intensely flavored gravy. The meat is marinated with spices and slow-cooked until tender, resulting in a delicious and aromatic dish .
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Sweet Potato Tikki
items.description: Spiced sweet potato patty shallow fried and served with spicy green chutney. (4 tikkis)

items.name: Lasuni Palak Kichidi
items.description: A flavorful and nutritious Indian dish that combines spinach (palak) and rice (kichidi) with a prominent garlic (lasuni) flavor. The dish is prepared by cooking rice and spinach together with a tempering of garlic, cumin seeds, and other spices

items.name: Ruwangan Chaman
items.description: A Kashmiri dish consisting of paneer (cottage cheese) cooked in a rich tomato and cream-based gravy, known for its creamy texture and aromatic spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Waza Kukur
items.description: A traditional Kashmiri dish of slow-cooked spiced chicken made by marinating chicken pieces in a mixture of yogurt and various spices, then slow-cooking them in a rich and aromatic gravy.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Masala Vada
items.description: Crispy deep-fried patty/vada made with a mixture of soaked and coarsely ground lentils, primarily chana dal (split chickpeas). (4 pieces)

items.name: Chicken Pulao
items.description: A popular dish made with fragrant basmati rice and tender pieces of chicken cooked in a flavorful broth with a blend of aromatic spices. The dish is garnished with fried onions, nuts, and fresh herbs, giving it a beautiful texture and taste.

items.name: Achari Paneer Chana Pulao
items.description: A wholesome and delicious one pot meal that is made with fragrant basmati rice, succulent Indian cottage cheese and chickepeas cooked together with pickling spices. Served with yogurt raita, pickle and papad

items.name: Malabar Chicken Biryani
items.description: A flavorful and aromatic South Indian dish, specifically associated with the Malabar region of Kerala. Marinated chicken pieces cooked with fragrant spices, herbs, and basmati rice, all layered together and slow-cooked to perfection. The biryani is known for its rich and spicy flavors, enhanced with ingredients like coconut milk and ghee, and is garnished with fried onions and fresh herbs. Served with raita and papad.

items.name: Oats & Mix Veg Chilla
items.description: A healthy, nutritious & savory pancake made from a batter of ground oats, various finely chopped vegetables and spices.

items.name: Lemon Rice
items.description: Rice, cashews, chillies and other spices stir fried together and mixed with lime juice. Served with achar and papad

items.name: Veg Hakka Noodles
items.description: Indo-Chinese dish with assorted veggies cooked with chinese sauces and noodles
items.extra: make it special with some veg manchurian gravy

items.name: Chicken Hakka Noodles
items.description: Indo-Chinese dish with assorted veggies and chicken cooked with chinese sauces and noodles.
items.extra: make it special with chicken manchurian gravy

items.name: Paneer 65
items.description: A popular Indian appetizer made with cubes of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) that have been marinated in a blend of spices and then deep-fried until crispy. The dish is spiced with a mix of chili powder, cumin, and coriander.

items.name: Matar Pulao
items.description: Rice cooked with whole spice, ghee, green peas and garnished with mint and corinader

items.name: Khatta Moong
items.description: A traditional Indian dish made from green gram lentils (moong dal) cooked with tamarind and a blend of spices. It's a tangy and slightly spicy lentil preparation that offers a unique flavor profile.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Saoji Chicken
items.description: A spicy and flavorful Indian dish known for its rich, aromatic gravy and tender chicken pieces, originating from the city of Nagpur.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Sindhi Koki
items.description: Whole wheat flour mixed with gram flour, onions, chillies, sesame seeds and other spices, pan cooked into a flatbread. Served with onion-tomato chutney. (2 koki)

items.name: Chaunsa
items.description: A dal preparation from Uttarakhand made with urad dal mixed with different spices and ghee. Served with rice

items.name: Diwani Handi
items.description: A rich and creamy North Indian curry featuring a medley of vegetables and paneer, cooked in a tomato-cashew-based gravy with aromatic spices, creating a delectable, indulgent dish
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Paithiri Lamb Stew
items.description: A traditional Kerala dish made with tender pieces of lamb cooked in a coconut-milk based gravy, infused with aromatic spices and herbs, creating a delightful South Indian flavor profile.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Oats & Rava Unniappam
items.description: Oats flour mixed with semolina, onions, grated carrot, ginger, yogurt and tempered with spices and cooked in small round moulds. Served with coconut chutney. (7 unniappams)

items.name: Sambar Rice
items.description: A comfort meal from the south of India. Lentils and veggies cooked together with tamarind, and freshly made sambar masala tempered with mustard seeds and curry leaves. Served with rice + papad

items.name: Veg Korma
items.description: Mix veggies cooked in yogurt based gravy with cramalised onion, cashew and freshly ground spices topped with fresh cream
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Hyderabadi Lamb Korma
items.description: Spicy lamb curry looked with whole garam masala, cashew paste, yogurt and spices
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + papad + side salad + achar

items.name: Kozhukattai
items.description: Small round rice flour dumplings steamed and then tempered with mustard seeds and curry leaves.

items.name: Olan & Rice
items.description: A traditional South Indian dish, particularly popular in the state of Kerala. It is a mild and subtly flavored stew made with pumpkin, cowpeas (black-eyed peas), coconut milk, and seasoned with curry leaves and green chilies. Served wih rice.

items.name: Dal Makhni
items.description: A popular North Indian dish made from black lentils (urad dal) and kidney beans (rajma) cooked in a rich and creamy tomato-based gravy. It is flavored with a blend of spices, butter, and cream, resulting in a luscious and indulgent lentil curry.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Butter Chicken Biryani
items.description: A delicious fusion dish that combines the flavors of butter chicken and biryani. It features tender pieces of chicken in a creamy tomato-based sauce, layered with fragrant, spiced rice, and slow-cooked to perfection, resulting in a rich and flavorful one-pot meal. served with raita + papad

items.name: Siddhu
items.description: A traditional Himachali dish, consisting of stuffed wheat flour dumplings filled with ingredients like paneer, greens, and spices steamed to perfection. It's a flavorful and wholesome specialty of the Himachal Pradesh.

items.name: Pulao
items.description: A flavorful Indian rice dish made with aromatic spices, basmati rice and a variety of vegetables.

items.name: Veg Singapore Fried Rice
items.description: A flavorful and spicy stir-fried rice dish including various vegetables, aromatic spices and seasonings. It's known for its bold and spicy flavors.

items.name: Chicken Singapore Fried Rice
items.description: A flavorful and spicy stir-fried rice dish that includes various vegetables and chicken topped with aromatic spices and seasonings. It's known for its bold and spicy flavors.

items.name: Indori Poha
items.description: Indore style preparation of poha (flattened rice). The dish includes ingredients like mustard seeds, curry leaves, peanuts, turmeric and garnished with sev (crispy fried noodles) and fresh coriander.

items.name: Dal Kichidi
items.description: Rice with yellow lentils, garlic, chilles and tomato pressure cooked together and topped with chilles and spicy tadka. Served with papad + achar
